DOC.detailed_description: The aim control clinical study evaluate Neodymiun : yttrium aluminum garnet laser , without fluoride , prevention occlusal caries primary dentition . High caries risk child ( 7.6±1.4 year ) select study receive following treatment : G1-1st molar negative control , 2nd molar receive resin sealant ; G2-1st molar negative control , 2nd molar receive laser irradiation ( 100 milliJoule , 5 Hertz - 0.5 Watts ) ; G3-1st molar receive fluoride gel 2nd molar receive fluoride gel + laser irradiation ; G4-1st molar receive fluoride varnish 2nd molar receive fluoride varnish + laser irradiation . Patients follow 12 month evaluate formation white-spot lesion and/or caries cavity three calibrate observer .
